C

chatApplication - module chatApplication
 
ChatRoomUDPView - Class in View
Is the user interface allowing to send messages to the other clients and reading the messages they sent.
ChatRoomUDPView(ClientUDP) - Constructor for class View.ChatRoomUDPView
Constructor of ChatRoomUDPView is a frame with a username and disconnect button area, a message area for the history, sent and received messages and a writing area with a send button for the client to write and send a new message.
ChatRoomView - Class in View
Is the user interface allowing to send messages to the other connected clients and reading the messages they sent.
ChatRoomView(Client) - Constructor for class View.ChatRoomView
Constructor of ChatRoomView Is a frame with a username and disconnect button area, a message area for the history, sent and received messages and a writing area with a send button for the client to write and send a new message.
Client - Class in stream
Client class allows the user to create a client to connect to the server of the chat application.
Client(Socket, String) - Constructor for class stream.Client
Constructor of Client.
ClientManager - Class in stream
ClientManager handles a client and sends its messages to all other connected clients Implements runnable to be executed in a thread.
ClientManager(Socket) - Constructor for class stream.ClientManager
Constructor of ClientManager.
ClientUDP - Class in UDP
This class creates a UDP client.
ClientUDP() - Constructor for class UDP.ClientUDP
Constructor of ClientUDP : initializes the username that is typed in by the user, the group and the socket of the client.
closeAll() - Method in class stream.Client
In case of an exception or when the client disconnects, loses the buffered reader and writer and the socket of the client.
closeAll() - Method in class UDP.ClientUDP
Closes the multicast socket of the client after leaving the group.
closeAll(Socket, BufferedReader, BufferedWriter) - Method in class stream.ClientManager
In case of an exception or when a client disconnects, deletes the client manager, closes the buffered reader and writer and the socket of the client.
